amendatorysection.para: (1) A permitholder who violates subsection (1) or (2) of section 69-2440 or section 69-2441 or 69-2442 is guilty of a Class III misdemeanor for the first violation and a Class I misdemeanor for any second or subsequent violation.
(2) A permitholder who violates subsection (3) of section 69-2440 is guilty of a Class I misdemeanor.
(3) A permitholder convicted of a violation described in subsection (1) or (2) of this section may also have his or her permit revoked.
